content: <script type = "text/javscript">var input = window.prompt("enter name");document.write("hello" + input);function checkInput(){if(document.getElementById('inputField').value.length == "")   {alert("you must enter your email");}}  var enteredNum;  var allNumbers = "";for(var i = 0; i < 3; i++)  {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number");  allNumbers += enteredNum + " ";  }  var count = 0;while(count < 3)  {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number");  allNumbers += enteredNum + " ";  count++;  }	  document.write(allNumbers);</script>
